verses.verse: A Song<WH7892> of degrees.<WH4609> They that trust<WH982> in the LORD<WH3068> shall be as mount<WH2022> Zion,<WH6726> which cannot<WH3808> be removed,<WH4131> but stays<WH3427> for ever.<WH5769>
As the mountains<WH2022> are round<WH5439> about Jerusalem,<WH3389> so the LORD<WH3068> is round<WH5439> about his people<WH5971> from now on<WH6258> even for ever.<WH5769>

For the rod<WH7626> of the wicked<WH7562> shall not rest<WH5117> on the lot<WH1486> of the righteous;<WH6662> lest<WH4616> <WH3808> the righteous<WH6662> put<WH7971> forth<WH7971> their hands<WH3027> to iniquity.<WH5766>
Do good,<WH2895> O LORD,<WH3068> to those that be good,<WH2896> and to them that are upright<WH3477> in their hearts.<WH3826>

As for such as turn<WH5186> aside<WH5186> to their crooked<WH6128> ways, the LORD<WH3068> shall lead<WH3212> them forth with the workers<WH6466> of iniquity:<WH205> but peace<WH7965> shall be on Israel.<WH3478>
